docs.snippet: Today is Monday, March 24, the 83rd day of 2014. There are 282 days left in the year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Today is Monday, March 24, the 83rd day of 2014. There are 282 days left in the year.

docs.snippet: The Japanese architect Shigeru Ban, who has combined a talent for innovative design and experimental use of everyday materials with extensive humanitarian efforts around the globe, has won the 2014 Pritzker Architecture Prize....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Japanese architect Shigeru Ban, who has combined a talent for innovative design and experimental use of everyday materials with extensive humanitarian efforts around the globe, has won the 2014 Pritzker Architecture Prize.

headline.main: Japanese Architect Shigeru Ban Wins Pritzker Prize
headline.print_headline: Japanese Architect Shigeru Ban Wins Pritzker Prize
